footer.tipEnableSTTFirst: Please enable speech transcription in language settings first

setting.limitDuration: The default speech-to-text time limit is 10 minutes

conversation.extendExperienceText: Extended experience can be extended by 10 minutes
conversation.extendExperienceFreeText: The free version of the language to text service trial lasts for 10 minutes and has been used up.
